description: When Minami`s family returned from Germany, she spoke little Japanese. Although she tried to fit in, her mistakes caused her classmates to stay away... except for Akihisa. Unfortunately, he screws up his attempts to be nice to her and upsets her instead.

titles.title: Eu, Japão E Uma Linguagem Que Não Sei!
Uchi to Nippon to Shiranai Kotoba
ウチと日本と知らない言葉
